Text.Language: Twbh m~P[oic e~h~r/i e~jwn: peniwt eyouab n~dikeoc: abba Teji yeo~vanioc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, our holy righteous father, Abba Roweis the Beholder of God, that He may forgive us our sins.
